articles.title: European Tour returns to Singapore in 2023, first time in 9 years - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The DP World Tour will return to Singapore in 2023 for the first time in nine years, as the golf organisation beefs up its Asian footprint, it said on Tuesday (Jun 21).
